Package com.example.syntaxeventlottery

Class EventRepository

java.lang.Object
com.example.syntaxeventlottery.EventRepository
public class EventRepository extends Object
Repository class for managing event data and interactions with Firebase Firestore and Firebase Storage. Handles operations such as fetching, updating, adding, and deleting events.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EventRepository()
    Constructor for initializing the repository and Firebase references.

  • Method Details

    • getLocalEventsList

      public ArrayList<Event> getLocalEventsList()
      Returns a local copy of the cached events list.
      Returns:
      A list of cached Event objects.

    • updateLocalEventsList

      public void updateLocalEventsList(DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Updates the local events list by fetching data from Firebase Firestore.
      Parameters:
      callback - A callback to notify the success or failure of the update operation.

    • addEventToRepo

      public void addEventToRepo(Event event, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, android.graphics.Bitmap qrCodeBitmap, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Adds a new event to the repository, including uploading optional images and QR codes.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be added.
      imageUri - The URI of the event poster image, if available.
      qrCodeBitmap - The bitmap of the event QR code.
      callback - A callback to notify the success or failure of the operation.

    • deleteEventFromRepo

      public void deleteEventFromRepo(Event event, DataCallback<Void> callback)
      Deletes an event from the repository.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be deleted.
      callback - A callback to notify the success or failure of the operation.

    • updateEventDetails

      public void updateEventDetails(Event event, @Nullable android.net.Uri imageUri, @Nullable android.graphics.Bitmap qrCodeBitmap, DataCallback<Event> callback)
      Updates the details of an event, including optional image and QR code uploads.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be updated.
      imageUri - The URI of the event poster image, if updated.
      qrCodeBitmap - The bitmap of the event QR code, if updated.
      callback - A callback to notify the success or failure of the operation.

    • eventToHashData

      public HashMap<String,Object> eventToHashData(Event event)
      Converts an Event object to a HashMap for Firestore storage.
      Parameters:
      event - The Event to be converted.
      Returns:
      A HashMap representation of the event.
